description: Balance House offers young adult addiction treatment in Utah, providing a safe and supportive environment to help young men overcome addiction.
cleaned_text: How Can We Help? The Balance House Group's mission is to help each and every client break free of addiction and live a full life in recovery. By emphasizing personal growth and self-respect through our truly individualized program, our proven approach encourages even the most treatment-resistant individuals. From primary addiction treatment to independent aftercare, we are there for you every step of the way. Experience the Balance House difference.
